function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to harmful UV-C light due to improper installation or maintenance of UVGI systems","Impact":"Risk of eye and skin damage for room occupants","Mitigation":"Proper installation, regular maintenance, and use of protective shields or louvers to prevent direct exposure to UV-C light","Technologies":"UVGI systems with protective shields or louvers","People":"Room occupants","Owner":"Building maintenance staff and health and safety personnel"},{"Description":"Insufficient UV-C irradiation doses to inactivate SARS-CoV-2 virions in respiratory droplets","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of upper-room UVGI in reducing transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conducting research to determine the required UV-C irradiation doses, and adapting UVGI systems to deliver higher doses if needed","Technologies":"Research on UV-C irradiation doses, and adaptive UVGI systems","People":"Research institutions, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unproven effectiveness of upper-room UVGI in inactivating SARS-CoV-2 virions in the air","Impact":"Unverified claims about the ability of UVGI to reduce transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Conducting rigorous testing and validation of UVGI systems specifically against SARS-CoV-2 virions, and transparently reporting the results","Technologies":"Rigorous testing protocols for UVGI systems and SARS-CoV-2 virions","People":"Public health authorities, building owners","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners"}]}
